original_text: Paul was ready to speak, but Gallio spoke first to the Jews. He said, ‘If this man had done a very bad thing, then I would judge him. It would be right for me to listen to you.
korean_text: 바울이 입을 열고자 할 때에 갈리오가 유대인들에게 이르되 너희 유대인들아 만일 이것이 무슨 부정한 일이나 불량한 행동이었으면 내가 너희 말을 들어 주는 것이 옳거니와

sentences.original_text: but Gallio spoke first to the Jews
If this man had done a very bad thing
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 이 사람이 아주 나쁜 일을 했다면

sentences.original_text: It would be right for me to listen to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 듣는 것이 옳을 것이다
